The O

was O
to O
show O
positive O
and O
progressive O
image O
of O

and O
how O

country O
is O

accepting O
us O

are O

. O

Pakistan B-LOC
is O
not O
only O
about O
terrorism O
and O

society O
there O
is O
more O
to O

. O

( O

and O
